articles.author: Kevin Liptak
articles.title: Oil tanker pursued by US now has a Russian flag painted on its side - CNN
articles.description: Crew members aboard the aging, rusted oil tanker that the US has been pursuing at sea for nearly two weeks appear to have painted a crude image of a Russian flag on the ship’s hull, which American officials believe is an attempt at claiming Russian protection…
articles.content: Crew members aboard the aging, rusted oil tanker that the US has been pursuing at sea for nearly two weeks appear to have painted a crude image of a Russian flag on the ships hull, which American off… [+2074 chars]
